General.Name: Compania Introductora de Buenos Aires SA
General.Description: Compañía Introductora de Buenos Aires S.A. industrializes and commercializes table salt, flavor seasonings, vinegars, olive oil, ketchup, soy sauce, and syrups for households. It also offers its products for companies that process food, textile companies, petrochemicals, and others. The company was founded in 1901 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Compañía Introductora de Buenos Aires S.A. is a subsidiary of F V Sociedad Anonima.
